title: Pins and needles
creator_credit: Barbara A. Chobocky, Kim Batterham, Genni Batterham and Documentary Films
brief_description: An account of the emotional struggle of a 24 year old woman, Genni Batterham, who contracts Multiple Sclerosis and becomes a paraplegic in less than 18 months. The film examines the attitude and reactions of her parents, husband and society.
creator_credit_for_label: Barbara A. Chobocky, Kim Batterham, Genni Batterham and Documentary Films
